Posts.EditableText:
New free sound effects for game developers - The free sound packs that can be downloaded contain several hundred sounds, for a total of about 3 GB. All SFX are available for download and can be used in commercial projects. All sounds are in high resolution WAV format and come from our professional sound libraries.

Don't forget to download the free 1GB sound pack available on the Bluezone Corporation homepage.


Browse the free sounds list : https://www.bluezone-corporation.com/free-sound-effects
